feed.title: AI/ML
feed.subtitle: This site, AI/ML will be a repository of all of my knowledge in the data science field. Hope you find some of them interesting.

entry.title: Critical Review on “OpenPose - Realtime Multi-Person 2D Pose Estimation using Part Affinity Fields”

link.title: Critical Review on “OpenPose - Realtime Multi-Person 2D Pose Estimation using Part Affinity Fields”

entry.summary: The proposed approach uses a nonparametric representation, also reffered to as Part Affinity Fields (PAFs), to learn to associate body parts with individual.
